rules_text:
Whenever one or more creatures die under an opponents control for the first time each turn, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
Blight {1}{B}{B}{B} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {1}{B}{B}{B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever you draw a card, Villainy of Shadows deals 2 damage to you and each opponent gains 2 life.
